workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.3034489371237252 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.11683887417958683 --weight-decay 0.00043383469718460624 --lr 0.000768432915651939 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 97137 --max-lr 0.0008922814031076495 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.4765825329022685 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.01823138421620747 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
